beckn:descriptor.schema:name: EV Charging Services Network
beckn:descriptor.beckn:shortDesc: Comprehensive network of fast charging stations across Bengaluru

beckn:descriptor.schema:name: DC Fast Charger - CCS2 (60kW)
beckn:descriptor.beckn:shortDesc: High-speed DC charging station with CCS2 connector
beckn:descriptor.beckn:longDesc: Ultra-fast DC charging station supporting CCS2 connector type with 60kW maximum power output. Features advanced thermal management and smart charging capabilities.

beckn:descriptor.schema:name: DC Fast Charger - CCS2 (120kW)
beckn:descriptor.beckn:shortDesc: Ultra-fast DC charging station with CCS2 connector
beckn:descriptor.beckn:longDesc: Ultra-fast DC charging station supporting CCS2 connector type with 120kW maximum power output. Features liquid cooling and advanced power management.

beckn:descriptor.schema:name: AC Fast Charger - Type 2 (22kW)
beckn:descriptor.beckn:shortDesc: AC fast charging station with Type 2 connector
beckn:descriptor.beckn:longDesc: AC fast charging station supporting Type 2 connector type with 22kW maximum power output. Ideal for overnight charging and workplace charging.

beckn:deliveryAttributes.authorizationOtpHint: Scan QR code at charging station
